thi-ap38:12.4: rundhantaṃ → nudantaṃ (s2, s3) | niddhantaṃ (pts1), katapāpakaṃ → kammapāpakaṃ (s2, s3)
thi-ap38:13.1: vuḍḍho daharo vā → yo vuḍḍho daharo vāpi (bj) | yo vuḍḍho daharo cāpi (s2, s3) | yo ca vuddho daharo vā (pts1)
thi-ap38:14.3: sutvā → ñatvā (bj), sa saṃviggo → susaṃviggo (s2, s3) | sasaṃviggo (pts1)
thi-ap38:16.1: tatonujānetvā → tato anumodetvā (bj) | tatonumodetvā (s2, s3) | tato 'numānetvā (pts1)
